parts.text: {"word":"polluere","priority":"N/A","meanings":[{"part_of_speech":"verb","definition":"(ラテン語)汚す、汚染する、不浄にする","english_definition":"(Latin) to pollute, defile, contaminate, stain.","examples":[{"sentence":"Flumen polluere.","translation":"川を汚す。"},{"sentence":"Animum scelere polluere.","translation":"犯罪で心を汚す。"}],"collocations":[],"synonyms":["contaminare","maculare","foedare"],"antonyms":["purificare","mundare"]}],"etymology":{"value":"印欧祖語の *pel- (汚れた、灰色) に由来する。","priority":"N/A"},"pronunciation":{"ipa":"/polˈlu.e.re/","syllables":"pol-lu-e-re"},"inflection":{"verb_forms":{"present_infinitive":"polluere","perfect_stem":"pollu-","present_active_indicative":{"1st_person_singular":"polluo","2nd_person_singular":"polluis","3rd_person_singular":"polluit","1st_person_plural":"polluimus","2nd_person_plural":"polluitis","3rd_person_plural":"polluunt"},"imperfect_active_indicative":{"1st_person_singular":"polluebam","2nd_person_singular":"polluebas","3rd_person_singular":"polluebat","1st_person_plural":"polluebamus","2nd_person_plural":"polluebatis","3rd_person_plural":"polluebant"},"future_active_indicative":{"1st_person_singular":"polluam","2nd_person_singular":"pollues","3rd_person_singular":"polluet","1st_person_plural":"polluemus","2nd_person_plural":"polluetis","3rd_person_plural":"polluent"},"perfect_active_indicative":{"1st_person_singular":"pollui","2nd_person_singular":"polluisti","3rd_person_singular":"polluit","1st_person_plural":"polluimus","2nd_person_plural":"polluistis","3rd_person_plural":"polluerunt"},"pluperfect_active_indicative":{"1st_person_singular":"pollueram","2nd_person_singular":"pollueras","3rd_person_singular":"polluerat","1st_person_plural":"pollueramus","2nd_person_plural":"pollueratis","3rd_person_plural":"polluerant"},"future_perfect_active_indicative":{"1st_person_singular":"polluero","2nd_person_singular":"pollueris","3rd_person_singular":"polluerit","1st_person_plural":"polluerimus","2nd_person_plural":"pollueritis","3rd_person_plural":"polluerint"}}}},"usage_notes":{"explanation":"主に比喩的な意味合いで使われることも多く、精神や名誉を汚すといった意味でも用いられる。現代英語の 'pollute' の語源。","priority":"N/A"},"common_mistakes":{},"related_words":{"derivatives":["pollutio (名詞: 汚染、不浄)","pollutus (形容詞: 汚された、不浄な)"]},"level_frequency":{},"readability_explanation":{},"example_sentences":[{"sentence":"Corrupti mores urbem polluunt.","translation":"堕落した風習が都市を汚染する。","type":"example","meaning_category":"汚染"}]}
